title: Smoky baked chickpeas
description: This healthy, spicy take on popcorn is easy to make and ideal snacking material for anyone avoiding the biscuit tin.One serving provides 189 kcal, 9g protein, 19g carbohydrate (of which 0.5g sugars), 8.5g fat (of which 4g saturates), 7g fibre and 2.2g salt.
ingredients: ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
¼  tsp cayenne pepper, to taste
